title: Problem installing Python 2.7.11
body:
Surprisingly, I'm having problems installing Python 2.7.11 with Spack (CentOS 7).  I have no problems with python@3:

```
$ spack install python@2.7:2.8
```

results in...

```
ux-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/netcdf-4.4.0-rx32ppcgwsxk2fxbexopuwk3xvtvrqbd/lib:/home2/rpfische/spack/opt/spack/linux-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/git-2.8.1-jacg3hncs6kq6gt5ctbjayu64lbnsaxv/lib64 ./python -E -S -m sysconfig --generate-posix-vars ;\
if test $? -ne 0 ; then \
    echo "generate-posix-vars failed" ; \
    rm -f ./pybuilddir.txt ; \
    exit 1 ; \
fi
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/runpy.py", line 162, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", fname, loader, pkg_name)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/runpy.py", line 72, in _run_code
    exec code in run_globals
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/sysconfig.py", line 636, in <module>
    _main()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/sysconfig.py", line 624, in _main
    _generate_posix_vars()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/sysconfig.py", line 304, in _generate_posix_vars
    raise IOError(msg)
IOError: invalid Python installation: unable to open /tmp/rpfische/spack-stage/spack-stage-8orwGQ/Python-2.7.11/pyconfig-64.h (No such file or directory)
generate-posix-vars failed
make: *** [pybuilddir.txt] Error 1
```

Enclosed is the full build log; does anyone know why this might be happening?

[spack_build.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/328887/spack_build.txt)
